title: Touch screen and game problems
body: I have tried everything i know possible, my game will not load unless my finger is on the screen. I can not play like that, when i remove my finger from the screen the game instantly freezes. What do i do to fix this, please, i am begging for help.

replies.body: To be honest, I've never heard of anyone play League as a touch screen so I'm not really sure how to assist here.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our tech team can look into this with.  We'll respond as soon as possible!
